body:
### Spack version

Current develop branch.

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack env create my-environment
$ spack env activate my-environment # works fine
$ spack env deactivate

$ spack env create my-henvironment
$ spack env activate my-henvironment # does not work
```

### Error Message

```console
==> This command works best with Spack's shell support
  
  To initialize spack's shell commands:
  
      # for bash and zsh
      . /gpfs/mira-home/mdorier/spack/share/spack/setup-env.sh
  
      # for csh and tcsh
      setenv SPACK_ROOT /gpfs/mira-home/mdorier/spack
      source /gpfs/mira-home/mdorier/spack/share/spack/setup-env.csh
  
  Or, if you want to use `spack env activate` without initializing
  shell support, you can run one of these:
  
      eval `spack env activate --sh my-henvironment`   # for bash/sh
      eval `spack env activate --csh my-henvironment`  # for csh/tcsh
```
title: Environment with -h in the name can't be activated
